mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KAKOREQUESTDTO ( C_NO, C_ID, PARTNER_ORDER_ID, PARTNER_USER_ID, ITEM_NAME, QUANTITY, TOTAL_AMOUNT, VAT_AMOUNT, TAX_FREE_AMOUNT, APPROVAL_URL, FAIL_URL, CANCEL_URL, PAY_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_C_NO.NEXTVAL, #{cid}, #{partner_order_id}, #{partner_user_id}, #{item_name}, #{quantity}, #{total_amount}, #{vat_amount}, #{tax_free_amount}, COALESCE(#{approval_url}, 'DEFAULT_URL'), #{fail_url}, #{cancel_url}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE KAKOREQUESTDTO SET PG_TOKEN = COALESCE(#{pg_token}, 'DEFAULT_URL'), PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} WHERE C_NO = (SELECT C_NO FROM (SELECT C_NO FROM KAKOREQUESTDTO ORDER BY C_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1)
mapper.select: SELECT k.C_NO, k.C_ID, k.PARTNER_ORDER_ID, k.PARTNER_USER_ID, k.ITEM_NAME, k.QUANTITY, k.TOTAL_AMOUNT, k.VAT_AMOUNT, k.TAX_FREE_AMOUNT, k.APPROVAL_URL, k.FAIL_URL, k.CANCEL_URL, k.PRODUCT_NO, k.PG_TOKEN, k.PAY_DATE, a.CHANGE_NAME FROM KAKOREQUESTDTO k JOIN ATTACHMENT a ON k.PRODUCT_NO = a.RPRODUCT_NO WHERE k.PARTNER_USER_ID = #{MemId} ORDER BY k.C_NO DESC
